content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Good day, Mary Smith. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for a monthly rental in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a budget of 1000 Euros per month.

I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I am dependable and responsible, so I am sure I can pay the rent on time.

I would like to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am 25 square meters.

I would like to negotiate with you.

I would like to accept the rental price proposed by you, if it is reasonable.

Otherwise, I will terminate the negotiation.

Thank you for your time.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your response, Mary. Based on your budget of 1000 Euros per month, I am afraid I cannot accept your offer. However, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a fair rental price that works for both of us.

Given that the apartment is only 25 square meters, I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price takes into account the cost of utilities and other expenses that come with renting an apartment in Munich.

I trust that you will be able to pay the rent on time and that we can establish a good working relationship. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your proposal.

I would like to negotiate further.

Can you offer me a lower rental price?

I am willing to discuss any options that you have in mind.

Thank you for your time.

I would like to accept your rental price of 800 Euros per month.

I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.

Thank you for your understanding.

I would like to move in as soon as possible.

Thank you again for your time.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate further, Mary. I am glad to hear that you are willing to consider my proposal.

Given the size and location of the apartment, I believe that 800 Euros per month is a fair rental price. However, I am willing to discuss any options that you have in mind.

If you would like to move in as soon as possible, I can work with you to arrange a move-in date that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Thank you again for your understanding, and I look forward to welcoming you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
